participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and creative, Emily has a passion for baking and a deep love for animals.
participant_1.background: I've a dogs. I love to bake cookies. I am scared of dying. The county wide bake sale is where I feel most at home.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and hardworking, James dedicates his time to animal rescue and believes in giving back to the community.
participant_2.background: I volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. My favorite color is navy blue. I work fulltime in a shipyard. I donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

content.text: hello, how are you? what do you do for a living? I am a student
that sounds like a lot of fun. do you have any pets?
that is a lot. I have a dogs. do you like to bake?
